name: Tessellations - Tiling Puzzle
description:
Explore the wonderful, magical world of geometry and shapes, how they tessellate, and solve puzzles!

Simply tap the pieces to rotate them, and connect all the pipes to solve the puzzle. It starts out easy, but quickly shows its harder side with larger and more complex boards.

Play with simple and easy triangles, move on to hexagons, and end up battling the mighty dodecagons!

Boards range from Small to Huge, and include:
- Triangles
- Squares
- Hexagons
- Octagons and Squares
- Squares and Triangles
- Hexagons and Triangles
- Hexagons, Squares, and Triangles
- Dodecagons, Hexagons, and Squares
